name: Leather Card Wallet
description:
Hand cut and stitched, these durable card wallets will carry your cards, cash, or calling cards using all natural materials and look great doing it. This 4-5 oz leather is a waxy English Bridle in Tan with burnished edges.

Choice of colors are the Tan, Black, or Brown English Bridle leather.

Lark Practical goods are made by hand in Rhinebeck, New York using the finest leather from American tanneries. Each piece is hand cut and stitched with Irish linen thread to make a piece that will last a lifetime.

The quality of our goods allows them to age beautifully as they become a part of your life.

name: Tan Leather Belt Lanyard with Key Ring
description:
These beautiful key ring lanyards are burnished, beveled and cut by hand, then assembled using quality solid brass collar stud hardware. . The loop is sized to be worn on your belt or bag strap, secured by a sturdy brass collar stud. The leather is a beautiful 8 oz English Bridle from a US tannery. The edges are burnished then waxed. The piece is finished with the stamp of Lark Practical on the inside and the two-headed Lark on the outer side. Sturdy construction and attention to detail means this piece will last for ages and look better every year.

Tan English Bridle 8 oz. leather.

The quality of our goods allows them to age beautifully as they become a part of your life.

name: Tan Leather Cuff Bracelet
description:
The Lark Practical wristband celebrates the beauty of natural materials in a sturdy, well-constructed and finished cuff. Hand cut, beveled, and burnished of the finest 8 oz English Bridle leather from a tannery in the US, this 1 in strap stays secure thanks to the solid brass stud and eyelet closure. The edges are burnished then waxed. The piece is finished with the stamp of Lark Practical on the inside and the 2 headed Lark on the outer side.
The cuff is Tan English Bridle.
